machine_ip.name: Machine IP Address or Hostname
machine_ip.description: The IP address or hostname of your Meticulous Espresso machine (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or meticulous.local)

socket_io_throttle_interval.name: Chatty Sensor Throttle Interval
socket_io_throttle_interval.description: How long to wait between Socket.IO sensor updates (in seconds, 1-10). Prevents MQTT flooding from chatty sensors like pressure and temperature. Each sensor tracked independently. (Default: 2)

stale_data_refresh_interval.name: Stale Data Refresh Interval
stale_data_refresh_interval.description: Force a full refresh of all sensor data after this time with no updates (in hours, 1-168). Ensures non-chatty sensors (settings, statistics, profile info) are periodically refreshed so Home Assistant doesn't forget them. (Default: 24)

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting. (Default: false)

mqtt_enabled.name: Enable MQTT
mqtt_enabled.description: Publish sensors via MQTT discovery (recommended). (Default: true)

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for MQTT broker. (Default: empty, auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for MQTT broker. (Default: empty, auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)

enable_delta_filtering.name: Enable Delta-Based Filtering
enable_delta_filtering.description: Use value change detection instead of time-based throttling. When enabled, sensors only publish when their value changes by more than the configured delta threshold, providing more intelligent filtering. (Default: true)

boiler_temperature_delta.name: Boiler Temperature Delta
boiler_temperature_delta.description: Minimum change in °C required to publish boiler temperature updates. Reduces MQTT flooding from high-frequency readings. (Default: 0.5)

brew_head_temperature_delta.name: Brew Head Temperature Delta
brew_head_temperature_delta.description: Minimum change in °C required to publish brew head temperature updates. (Default: 0.5)

external_temp_1_delta.name: External Temperature 1 Delta
external_temp_1_delta.description: Minimum change in °C required to publish external sensor 1 readings. (Default: 0.5)

external_temp_2_delta.name: External Temperature 2 Delta
external_temp_2_delta.description: Minimum change in °C required to publish external sensor 2 readings. (Default: 0.5)

pressure_delta.name: Pressure Delta
pressure_delta.description: Minimum change in bar required to publish pressure updates. Typical range 0.1-0.5 bar. (Default: 0.2)

flow_rate_delta.name: Flow Rate Delta
flow_rate_delta.description: Minimum change in ml/s required to publish flow rate updates. (Default: 0.1)

shot_weight_delta.name: Shot Weight Delta
shot_weight_delta.description: Minimum change in grams required to publish shot weight updates. (Default: 0.1)

shot_timer_delta.name: Shot Timer Delta
shot_timer_delta.description: Minimum change in seconds required to publish shot timer updates. (Default: 1.0)

elapsed_time_delta.name: Elapsed Time Delta
elapsed_time_delta.description: Minimum change in seconds required to publish elapsed time updates. (Default: 1.0)

target_temperature_delta.name: Target Temperature Delta
target_temperature_delta.description: Minimum change in °C required to publish target temperature. Set to 0.0 to publish any change. (Default: 0.0)

target_weight_delta.name: Target Weight Delta
target_weight_delta.description: Minimum change in grams required to publish target weight. Set to 0.0 to publish any change. (Default: 0.0)

target_pressure_delta.name: Target Pressure Delta
target_pressure_delta.description: Minimum change in bar required to publish target pressure. Set to 0.0 to publish any change. (Default: 0.0)

target_flow_delta.name: Target Flow Delta
target_flow_delta.description: Minimum change in ml/s required to publish target flow. Set to 0.0 to publish any change. (Default: 0.0)

voltage_delta.name: Voltage Delta
voltage_delta.description: Minimum change in volts required to publish voltage readings. (Default: 1.0)

brightness_delta.name: Brightness Delta
brightness_delta.description: Minimum change in percentage points (0-100) required to publish brightness updates. (Default: 1)
